tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fashion_event_details (
    event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE NOT NULL,
    event_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    photographer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE runway_shows (
    show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_name VARCHAR(255),
    show_date DATE,
    show_location VARCHAR(255),
    designer_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE product_launches (
    launch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    launch_name VARCHAR(255),
    launch_date DATE,
    launch_location VARCHAR(255),
    brand_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductLaunches (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  event_date DATE NOT NULL,
  product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  product_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE EventAttendees (
  attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  attendee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  attendee_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  registration_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT NOT NULL,
    photographer_id INT NOT NULL,
    image_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    image_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE runway_shows (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100),
    event_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    designer VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE product_launches (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100),
    launch_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    brand VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE event_attendees (
    attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE event_shots (
    shot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    photographer_name VARCHAR(100),
    shot_date DATETIME,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE event_sponsors (
    sponsor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sponsor_name VARCHAR(100),
    event_id INT,
    sponsorship_level VARCHAR(50),
    contact_person VARCHAR(100)
)
